name: "Button Energy"
description:
I Made this game as the first ever "finished project" the core gameplay ended up, as many first projects, being dull, and it was impossible to make levels for the game, and especially with 15 minutes remaining. play it if you you want, thx if so ;)

Thanks to pixelFrog for letting me and everyone else use his awesome pixel art for our games.

movement is on WASD keys

R resets the level and "Button Energy Bar"

Q makes a bomb to blow up brick walls

Theme taken - minimal Interactions
